author: bojan
msg: Comment the SSL Session ID check in server.xml

author: bojan
msg: Make SSL Session ID check optional

author: bojan
msg:
Verify SSL Session ID against Tomcat session.
Disables Tomcat session stealing over SSL.

Since nobody complained about the concept, I took the liberty to do it... Scream if against the rules.

author: larryi
msg: Update so hopefully fewer people with NT or Win2k will add the filter
with the manager and incorrectly also add the "Filter DLLs" registry key.

author: billbarker
msg: While this makes it possible to mis-configure connectors easier, that is your fault.  LATER can make adjustLimits deal with setting defaults if the admin sets goofy parameters.
